mu8.h(7) Miscellaneous Information Manual mu8.h(7)

NAME

mu8.h — zero-terminated UTF-8 string routines and constants

LIBRARY

library “libmjo”

SYNOPSIS

#include <mu8.h>


void
mjo_u8_calc( int *const , size_t * const , unsigned char const );

int
mjo_u8_validate( int *const , unsigned char const **const , unsigned char const *);

int
mjo_u8_validate_nth_sequence( unsigned char const *);

int
mjo_u8_trim( unsigned char const *);

int
mjo_u8_trim_left( unsigned char const *);

int
mjo_u8_trim_right( unsigned char const *);

INCLUDES

<stddef.h>

DESCRIPTION

Provides calculation, validation and manipulation routines for UTF-8 strings.

SEE ALSO

mjo_u8_calc(3), mjo_u8_validate(3), mjo_u8_trim(3), mjo_u8_trim_left(3), mjo_u8_trim_right(3)

July 22, 2020 OpenBSD 7.0
